title: Violent Storms and Weather Manipulation - Best of Coast To Coast AM - 4/3/17
itunes:title: Violent Storms and Weather Manipulation - Best of Coast To Coast AM - 4/3/17
description:
George Noory and guest Scott Stevens discuss an increase in powerful storms and if chem trails are linked to efforts by mankind to control the weather.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
